mapper.update: update "users" set uts = #{uts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repo_id = #{repoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, uts, user_name, repo_id, user_type, status, real_name, pwd, comment, enable from "users" where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select user_id, uts, user_name, repo_id, user_type, status, real_name, pwd, comment, enable from "users"
